originalText.text: Dr. Corielli is by far the best pediatric dentist in NYC along with Dr. Pirooz , hygienist Angie and assistant Uryana . They have achieved to make my kids love going to the dentist when i thought that would be impossible. You feel the love and care in the office. Angie , one of the hygienist is a true gem. I am beyond grateful of the love and care they provide for my kids. Keep up the excellent service you provide.

originalText.text: We always have an amazing experience at Bright Smiles and with Dr. Corielli! They work so well with my kids - they are always so friendly, calm, efficient and make the whole appointment seamless. Would highly recommend them to anyone looking for a pediatric dentist.

text.text: We always have an amazing experience at Bright Smiles and with Dr. Corielli! They work so well with my kids - they are always so friendly, calm, efficient and make the whole appointment seamless. Would highly recommend them to anyone looking for a pediatric dentist.

originalText.text:
Bright Healthy Smiles is a wonderful office and I recommend this as a pediatric dentist without reservation.

As the mother of two daughters it is a great feeling
That my girls always look forward to coming to the dentist.

The entire staff is exceptional. Dr Corelli is a class act who delivers outstanding patient care and is extremely knowledgeable. The office is very organized and well run. It is truly a pleasure to be a part of this wonderful practice and I give it my highest recommendation.

text.text:

As the mother of two daughters it is a great feeling
That my girls always look forward to coming to the dentist.

The entire staff is exceptional. Dr Corelli is a class act who delivers outstanding patient care and is extremely knowledgeable. The office is very organized and well run. It is truly a pleasure to be a part of this wonderful practice and I give it my highest recommendation.

originalText.text: My family has had the most wonderful experiences with the Bright Smiles team and Dr. Corielli. They are so professional, friendly, welcoming and knowledgeable. They always put my daughter and son at ease by clearly explaining each step of the exam/ cleaning and both my children look forward to their checkups. I highly recommend Bright Smiles to anyone who may need a pediatric Dentist and live in the area- I am certain you will love their team as much as we do!

text.text: My family has had the most wonderful experiences with the Bright Smiles team and Dr. Corielli. They are so professional, friendly, welcoming and knowledgeable. They always put my daughter and son at ease by clearly explaining each step of the exam/ cleaning and both my children look forward to their checkups. I highly recommend Bright Smiles to anyone who may need a pediatric Dentist and live in the area- I am certain you will love their team as much as we do!

originalText.text:
Bright Healthy Smile is a pediatric dental practice that welcomes kids in an atmosphere that is child-friendly from the get go starting for example with the waiting room which is full of with fun toys and games. Lighting and cleanliness are impeccable. The office staff is wonderful and as capable to make kids feel at easy from the moment they walk through the door as they are to facilitate and handle insurance reimbursement matters. This is the place you really want to go if you want your kids to have a wonderful experience while caring for their health and wellness.

Most important, Dr. Corielli and her medical staff are very professional and capable, open minded and attentive to kids needs while also listening to the parents’ concerns. They are as prepared to deliver dental treatments as they are to discuss prevention. Dr Corielli has access to an excellent network of other dental specialists and she was able to point me in the right direction when my daughter needed additional care My daughter loves Dr.Corielli and her staff and the little treats she will have at the end of the appointment
